page.title: 10SUNDAY IN COEDPOETH
page.content:
The area around{Coedpoeth}could at one time boast a strong religious following as the number of places of worship in the area would suggest. However, by today the places of worship are very poorly attended having only somwhere in the region of 15 to 30 worshippers each per service.
The public houses on the other hand,slightly outnumbered by the chapels compensate by being able to boast a larger and more dedicated following.They open in the afternoon from 12 noon until 3 p.m. and again from 6 p.m. till 11 p.m.in the evening.The majority of the male clientele preferring the locally brewed{Wrexham Lager}at approximately 70p a pint.
